tool_description: Gets blockMeshDict mesh files ready to use on simulations
name: OpenFoamMeshAPI
title: OpenFoamMeshAPI

api_list.name: Get a single mesh file
api_list.description: Get a single mesh file in JSON format

api_list.name: Get list of all meshes available from tutorials
api_list.description: Get list of all meshes available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://openfoammeshapi.p.rapidapi.com/tutorials"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openfoammeshapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://openfoammeshapi.p.rapidapi.com/tutorials"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openfoammeshapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
